tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (ADVP (IN So)) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN hour)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN peace))) (SBAR (IN with) (S (NP (CC both) (NP (NP (NNS boys)) (ADJP (RB asleep)))) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB be) (VP (VBN spent) (S (NP (NN math) (NN planning)) (ADJP (JJ #sarcastic)))))))))))
